patthana22.2:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:1.1_1: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:1.1_2: Naakusalaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:1.1_3: Naabyākataṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:1.1_4: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naabyākataṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:1.1_5: Nakusalaṁ nasahetukañca naakusalaṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:2.1_0: Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.2:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:3.1_1: Naakusalaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:3.1_2: Naabyākataṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:3.1_3: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:3.1_4: Naakusalaṁ naahetukañca naabyākataṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:3.1_5: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañca naakusalaṁ naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.2:4.1_0: Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte dvādasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate dvādasa.
